name: Silent Witch: The Rod of Withering
name_original: Silent Witch: The Rod of Withering
description: Magic is difficult without the ability to speak, and Abby Grainger has worked hard to overcome this disability since the day she was born. Now she finds herself enrolled into the illustrious Bulfinch’s Academy of Magic. But she’s not here to learn. Abby has been tasked with stealing the country’s most dangerous artifact from the school’s vault: the Rod of Withering.
